<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elemental Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4741) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 133 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Untamed Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=4713)

</column>

---

You understand the fundamental elements of nature such that you can imbue them into your body and manifest as a living embodiment of those elements. Add the shapes in [_elemental form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1510) to your untamed form list. Whenever you're polymorphed into another shape using untamed form, you gain resistance 5 to fire.

<title level="2">Elemental Shape leads to...</title>
[Reactive Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=4754)
name: Elemental Shape
